product_description: Made from cotton with a touch of stretch so it's as easy as it is elegant, this short-sleeve dress features a waist-defining tie and a flared, tiered skirt.
product_details_and_care:
Made from cotton with a touch of stretch so it's as easy as it is elegant, this short-sleeve dress features a waist-defining tie and a flared, tiered skirt.
41 1/2" length (size 8)
Hidden back-zip closure
Jewel neck
Short sleeves
Removable sash
Unlined
97% cotton, 3% elastane
Dry clean
Made in Italy
Item #6050857
